mapper.insert: insert into gil_board ( idx, id, filename, title, content, flag ) values ( (select nvl(max(idx), 0)+1 from gil_board), #{id}, #{filename} ,#{title} ,#{content} ,#{flag} )
mapper.select: select idx, title, regdate from gil_board where flag='notice'
select idx, title, filename, content from gil_board where idx=${idx}
select filename from gil_board where idx=#{idx}
mapper.update: update gil_board set title=#{title}, filename=#{filename}, content=#{content} where idx=#{idx}
mapper.select: select idx, filename, title, regdate from gil_board where flag='cocktail'
